title: What happens after IÂ submit my email address to get my username and password?
excerpt: If you have a Pearson account, you'll get an email with your username and a to
content:
If you have a Pearson account, you'll get an email with your username and a link to reset your password.

For multiple accounts, the email lists all your usernames and separate links to reset your passwords. Make sure you only link one Pearson account.
